author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove the BSC detector from the description of all phase 2 scenarios. Also, remove the descriptions of all depreciated sub-detector scenarios

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex165 Remove the BSC detector from the description of all phase2 scenarios
